mapper.insert: insert into pms_brand (name, first_letter, sort, factory_status, show_status, product_count, product_comment_cout, logo, big_pic, brand_story) values (#{name}, #{firstLetter}, #{sort}, #{factoryStatus}, #{showStatus}, #{productCount}, #{productCommentCount}, #{logo}, #{bigPic}, #{brandStory})
mapper.select: select id, name, first_letter, sort, factory_status, show_status, product_count, product_comment_cout, logo, big_pic, brand_story from pms_brand
